In England, in the seven days to 04 June, there were 26,831 new confirmed cases (47.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 May, there were 17,479 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 54% (9,352 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 June is 3,956,096 (7,028.4 cases per 100,000 population).
